description: Strips of silk ikat warp, red silk weft, sewn together; repeating pattern of yellow circle with purple and blue patches inside of pink circle with 4 S-shaped swirls and purple patches with yellow S-shaped swirls and red and blue patches; backed with floral print in pinks and white; tassels at corners
markings: [94 X 60] and star stamp, on front of paper tag, and [I458] and [on the roll], on back of paper tag, stapled at upper left corner
title: Panel
